title: Daily: World Password Day, OpIcarus
description: Today we consider various ways of hiding attack campaigns: noisily or quietly, what the approaches have in common is highly selective targeting. Anonymous proceeds with Operation Icarus (against "the global banking cartel").  We observe World Password Day with advice from AT&T's Johannes Jaskolski and Johns Hopkins' Joe Carrigan. Plus, we take a quick look at how one script kiddie values his stolen data.
itunes:author: CyberWire, Inc.
